title: South Korea exports seen rising in December on strong chip demand
description:
South Korean exports likely rose for the seventh consecutive month in December, led by strong chip demand for artificial intelligence technologies, a Reuters poll showed on Monday. 
...
content:
SEOUL, Dec 29 (Reuters) - South Korean exports likely rose for the seventh consecutive month in December, led by strong chip demand for artificial intelligence technologies, a Reuters poll showed on Monday.

title: China issues drafts rules to regulate AI with human-like interaction
description: China’s cyber regulator on Saturday issued draft rules for ‍public comment that would tighten oversight of ​artificial intelligence services
content:
China’s cyber regulator on Saturday issued draft rules for ‍public comment that would tighten oversight of ​artificial intelligence services designed to simulate human ‌personalities and engage users ​in emotional interaction.

title: AI reshaping commerce industry from assisted buying to autonomous transactions: Report
description: Artificial Intelligence is starting to reshape the commerce sector, with the shift moving beyond recommendations and customer support to AI agents that can independently complete purchases on behalf of consumers and businesses, highlighted a report by Global Payments Inc., which provides technology and services for processing payments.

title: Indian-origin techie who helped Apple fight terrorism quits to build startup
description: Kalyani Ramadurgam studied computer science with a specialisation in artificial intelligence and machine learning.
